title: [The Funeral of Field Marshall Sir Thomas Blamey, Melbourne]
brief_description:
View of the cortege up Swanston Street at Victoria Street intersection - shows defence service and civilian marchers, bands and service troops, crowds.
Silent film with title missing and no credits available.
